description: Blend two video frames into each other.
name: blend

options.description: set component #0 blend mode (from 0 to 39) (default normal)
options.name: c0_mode

options.description: set component #1 blend mode (from 0 to 39) (default normal)
options.name: c1_mode

options.description: set component #2 blend mode (from 0 to 39) (default normal)
options.name: c2_mode

options.description: set component #3 blend mode (from 0 to 39) (default normal)
options.name: c3_mode

options.description: set blend mode for all components (from -1 to 39) (default -1)
options.name: all_mode

options.description: set expression for all color components
options.name: all_expr

options.description: set opacity for all color components (from 0 to 1) (default 1)
options.name: all_opacity

options.description: Action to take when encountering EOF from secondary input  (from 0 to 2) (default repeat)
options.name: eof_action

options.description: force termination when the shortest input terminates (default false)
options.name: shortest

options.description: extend last frame of secondary streams beyond EOF (default true)
options.name: repeatlast

choices.help: Frame from secondary input with the nearest lower or equal timestamp to the primary input frame
choices.name: default

choices.help: Frame from secondary input with the absolute nearest timestamp to the primary input frame
choices.name: nearest

options.description: How strictly to sync streams based on secondary input timestamps (from 0 to 1) (default default)
options.name: ts_sync_mode
